column4: How do I connect to a remote MySQL server using the mysql CLI application?
The application would be phpmyadmin. You might have to install it.
I was just told I could do "mysql --host" to connect.
You can connect to your mysql host via terminal and commandline. phpMyadmin is a Web.based admin software. YOu would probably access it with www. yourhost.com/phpMyadmin or so.
